thread.title: John Melson

author: John Melson
title: John Melson
text: Hello friends! I hasten to note that this review I write only truly positive mood, because life story associated with the company Limos—Åanner certainly poloitelno impact on my life. About a week ago I went to my sister for a wedding in Moscow, on arrival at the hotel I found out about the upcoming ceremony, and everything seemed perfect except for the fact that nebylo car, which would have had to carry the bride to walk on the evening city. Immediately after finding out this important detail I began to look for a decent company, hours were spent searching for, as it turned out not in vain, because my eyes appeared the above-named company. The next day I ordered a Rolls Royce (lemuzin) and proved to be glad because at the appointed place at the appointed time and saw the car. The wedding was excellent.
